com.heaton.bot
Class Log

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.Log
public class Log
extends java.lang.Object

The log class is used to write out log information. Copyright 2001-2003 by Jeff Heaton(http://www.jeffheaton.com)

Version:
1.2
Author:
Jeff Heaton

Field Summary
protected static int level
          What level to log to.
static int LOG_LEVEL_DUMP
          Display the greatest amort of log information all info packets will be displayed.
static int LOG_LEVEL_ERROR
          Log only errors.
static int LOG_LEVEL_NONE
          Log nothing.
static int LOG_LEVEL_NORMAL
          Normal level of logging.
static int LOG_LEVEL_TRACE
          Display enough information so that the operation of the program could be traced.
protected static boolean log2console
          Are we logging to the console?
protected static boolean log2file
          Are we logging to a file.
protected static java.lang.String path
          The path of the log file.
